page.title: 11Cutsdean Church
page.content: Cutsdean Church is a sister Church of St. Mary's, Temple Guiting. They share an incumbent,Rev.S. Wilson. Services are held in the church every Sunday morning and it holds its own major religious celebrations such as Christmas and Harvest. The church is very small with room for no more than 30 people and has no Vestry,the door opening directly onto the Farmyard of Cutsdean Farm in which it stands somewhat hidden away. It can just be seen from the Ford to Snowshill lane which passes to the West of Cutsdean. The church is a Church of England church.
